_id.description: The unique tag ID which should start with `tag:` and the remains are randomly generated string

_rev.description: This is a CouchDB specific field. The current MVCC-token/revision of this document (mandatory and immutable)

count.description: It indicates the number of notes with the tag

color.description: The color type of the tag

updatedAt.description: The date time when the tag was last updated, represented with Unix timestamps in milliseconds

createdAt.description: The date time when the tag was created, represented with Unix timestamps in milliseconds
